description:
# HideChatButtons

 Hide the unnecessary buttons/buttons from the chat bar (aka App Launcher, Gift and Voice Record)
Remember to restart your app after you installed the plugin
Optional: you can uninstall "HideRecordButton" & "HideGiftButton"

Download: https://serstars.is-a.dev/plugins/p/HideChatButtons.js
Source: https://serstars.is-a.dev/plugins/s/HideChatButtons
